posts.postText:
1) Which server:TTT
2) Offender's name:Zephon
3) Offender's SteamID: (in one of the pictures but just in case) Steam_0:31897888
4) Explain the situation in detail: Well, He gets on, And out of no where he starts shooting afterwards and kills just about half the team ( Half of the damage logs  are him killing people).
5) Were any specific server rules broken: Rdm and trolling
6) Any staff members on the server at the time of the offence: Nope
7) Proof:
